attributes.action: Breath Test Politicians for Alcohol before entering Parliament
attributes.additional_details: Several politicians have recently appeared to be slurring words or babbling rubbish during speeches or interviews given. I think we the public have a right to know our country is being governed by sober people.
attributes.background: Important decisions governing our country can not be made under the influence of alcohol

rejection.details:
In particular we are not sure what you mean by "entering Parliament".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like to happen. For example, you could ask the House of Commons to create a rule banning MPs from taking part in parliamentary business if they are under the influence of alcohol.
